titleStmt.title: The godly merchant, or The great gaine A sermon preached at Paules Crosse. Octob. 17. 1613. By William Pemberton, Bachelour of Diuinity, and Minister of Gods Word at high Onger in Essex.
titleStmt.author: Pemberton, William, d. 1622.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Edw. Griffin for Samuel Macham, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Bul-head,

notesStmt.note: Identified as STC 19569A on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Bul-head
